snippet.title: Shadows of Wyrmwood Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3327710/Shadows_of_Wyrmwood/

Shadows of Wyrmwood is a roguelike adventure RPG where every encounter can be life or death. Use spells, swords, and strategy to defeat every corrupted foe blocking you from the ultimate challenge of the corrupted dragons. Adventure across four procedurally generated dungeons that grow harder and harder with every encounter. With each victory, you obtain new armor, weapons, and spells from defeated enemies. Adapt, survive, and overcome every challenge across the land to save all who have been corrupted.  Do you have what it takes to be the Hero?

Links
Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3327710/Shadows_of_Wyrmwood/
Website: https://www.dreamfoundrygames.com/shadows-of-wyrmwood
